name: Treasure Collector (Igor-VL)
description:
A simple platformer that I made to better learn Pygame.

I learnt a lot from ClearCode tutorial and decided to really make it my own with a bunch of new features and game mechanics. 

The asset pack I used was Treasure Hunters as well as some elements from Ninja Adventure

The game has 5 levels and I hope you enjoy them!

Commands:

  • Escape to go back pages
  • Return or mouseclick to select buttons
  • Default is as follows but they can be edited 
    • A - Move Left
    • D - Move Right
    • Space - Jump

Please note I complied the game on macOS Monterey, so I'm not sure if it will run on lower versions!
